rows.label: qev093001_MSG0010
rows.name: Hey, how ya been? Been a while, hasn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0020
rows.name: Ah... Hello there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_JNK0030
rows.name: Speak to Neil

rows.label: qev093001_SEL0040
rows.name: Ask Neil what the deal is.

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0050
rows.name:
Hmm? Nothing in particular.
I just happened to see you and thought I'd say hi.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0060
rows.name:
...Okay, that's a lie.
I was hoping to talk to you about something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0070
rows.name: We can take it to the barracks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_JNK0080
rows.name: Speak to Celica

rows.label: qev093001_SEL0090
rows.name: Ask Celica what's up.

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0100
rows.name:
Well...I think Lady Neil was hoping to
discuss something with you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0110
rows.name: Right. Here's the thing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0120
rows.name: Wait—before all that, I believe I owe you my thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0130
rows.name:
I hear you saved my dear little sister.
Celicaculica truly landed in hot water![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0140
rows.name: Really...thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0150
rows.name:
Wha— "Little sister" is going too far, Lady Neil!
I am not worthy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0160
rows.name: Really? I disagree.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0170
rows.name:
We were both spawned from the same artificial womb plant.
We Qlu are all one big family, aren't we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0180
rows.name:
Perhaps, but you're the High Custodian!
The most exalted in all of Qlurian society![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0190
rows.name: Whereas I am from a line of acolytes who serve you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0200
rows.name:
The mere act of accompanying you like this—
it's an honor beyond compare...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0210
rows.name: Ah ha ha! Is that so![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0220
rows.name:
I haven't been back to our home planet in so long,
but I see our education system is as rigid as ever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0230
rows.name:
I'm tired of all this pomp and ceremony.
Leave the hierarchical stuff to the other girls.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0240
rows.name:
I'd appreciate it if you could simply
be yourself around me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0250
rows.name: Lady Neil...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0260
rows.name: Whoops, we're getting sidetracked.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093001_MSG0270
rows.name:
I'll tell you the rest in the BLADE barracks.
It'll be easier if you see the data firsthand.[ST:wait ]
